name: Grocery Madness
description:
You play as Dexter Murray, a world wide known professional singer and celebrity. You need to get your groceries, problem is: you have a lot of fans. They all want to take a photo with you, speak with you, ask for an autograph, etc. Although you love your fans, you don't have time for that today, you're in a rush. Your fans are everywhere in the grocery store, it is pure CHAOS! You still need to do your grocery. Try searching all around the store and finding all the items you see in your grocery list before you meet with a fan. You must hurry before one of them comes at you!
Press R to restart Credits:

Huge thanks to Extrinity for the game over, win and main menu song! (used in LMMS)

Crowd SFX: "Ambience, Large Crowd, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

Black outline by Chris Nolet on the Unity Asset Store: "Quick Outline"
